metadata.name: Powershell Local Email Collection
metadata.comment: Adversaries may target user email on local systems to collect sensitive information. Files containing email data can be acquired from a users local system, such as Outlook storage or cache files.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-inbox.ps1')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('microsoft.office.interop.outlook')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('microsoft.office.interop.outlook.oldefaultfolders')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-comobject outlook.application')))

output.summary: Adversaries may target user email on local systems to collect sensitive information. Files containing email data can be acquired from a users local system, such as Outlook storage or cache files.
